name: Ghost: Tactical Operations Agent
description:
Game Description

In Ghost: Tactical Operations Agent, you, the agent must take down the evil corporation using keen decision-making and strategy. The agency you pledge your allegiance to has tasked you with three missions. First, you must capture the corporation’s top-secret intelligence. The intelligence will give you the information on where the agency’s scientist is being held captive, your second mission. Lastly, you must take down the evil corporation once and for all by planting a bomb in their base. How you carry out these missions is up to you. Either complete them stealthily, or use your gun to defeat waves of enemies. Just be prepared to face the consequences of your actions.

This game was inspired by games such as Hotline Miami and Metal Gear Solid. It is a mix of a top-down shooter and a stealth puzzle game.

  • Similar to Hotline Miami
  • Elements of stealth
  • Face different types of enemies
  • Recommended 12+: Guns and violence
  • No blood

Release date: July 1, 2021

Platform: Windows

Price: $00.00
